title: Silent Hill: Homecoming playthrough — Part 2
description: Welp, that was a game. I'm amazed I actually beat it. The bosses were kind of cool. I liked how they tried to make the story interesting, very good try. I'm upset I didn't get with Wheeler considering he's the only character I liked. Worst SH game so far!

fragments.text: Yeah, I come when your discord bot sends the notification

Well, if I actually want to get home I'd have to miss about 30 minutes of the stream, but it's okay

I'll have to leave earlier in the future
